title: [Discussion] When will the isa 1 be for 1st year students
content: When will the isa 1 be for 1st year students

comments.body: it will be given in your calendar of events, and if you haven't seen/received it yet, it will be sent in a few days

This is what I heard from my friend. Please crosscheck.


 ISA -1 will be held on Sept 22. It will be of 40 marks.
Itâ€™s for 2/3rd year refer your calendar of event from the website

Yes I was wrong. Its on Oct 27th 

https://preview.redd.it/odi5vmhb0jmf1.jpeg?width=1083&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=bd7cabdd01f77d4fa55dab13f70e4fc9843274ab

2nd month's last week , since you started the sem.  
all the late batches(round 2 etc)  will have same exam date as the first batch with extra classes.
